item.title: 【Albums (lossy)】MP3 - Natasha Ramos (Jennifer Lopez's Ghost Singer) - Show & Prove (Unreleased Album)
item.description:
​
Natasha Ramos is an American singer-songwriter from Harford, CT. She is best known for being a background singer on several songs by entertainer Jennifer Lopez; most notably, "Jenny from the Block."

For years, rumors have alleged that Ramos' backup vocals were used as lead vocals on multiple tracks from Lopez's 2002 album, This Is Me... Then. In 2024, Ramos herself confirmed the rumors on TikTok, noting that her vocals can be heard on "I'm Glad," "The One," "Loving You," "Baby I Love U!" and the aforementioned "Jenny from the Block."

Ramos was originally signed to Arista Records in 2003. That same year, she recorded a song with The Neptunes, "Midnight Hour." She left the label in 2004 and subsequently signed with Star Trak, the record imprint co-owned by Pharrell Williams. In 2006, she began work on her first studio album, Show & Prove, set for release that same year. For reasons unknown, the album was shelved in 2007.

Ramos eventually released several tracks slated for Show & Prove on her 2011 mixtape, Feelin' Myself. Other songs from the project have leaked.


(Album art by yours truly.)​

1. Midnight Hour
2. Deeper (feat. Robin Thicke)
3. On Lock
4. Invisible (Ruff Mix)
5. Screwed (Ruff Mix)
6. Pack Up (Ruff Mix)
7. Dope Boy (feat. Pharrell)
8. This Love (Interlude)
9. Last Night
10. Feelin' Myself (Ruff Mix)
11. One Way
12. That Moment
13. Say Uh
14. Running Out of Love
15. Music Box
16. Strawberries (Ruff Mix)
17. Lady Like ^
18. It Was You
19. Jenny from the Block (Demo)*

^ - Track 17 is incorrectly titled "Lady Likes."
* - Bonus track.
